greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers that have an even number of 0's and 1's in their binary expansion.
link: Indranil Ghosh, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..32768
example: 36 is in the sequence because 36 = 100100_10. '100100' has two 1's and four 0's. - _Indranil Ghosh_, Feb 10 2017
program: (PARI) is(n)=hammingweight(n)%2==0 && hammingweight(bitneg(n, #binary(n)))%2==0 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 26 2013
results.author: _Patrick De Geest_, Dec 15 2000
